Description: Book of Amduat of Amenmose; frame 1; black and red vignettes; cursive Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: Lenzo, G. 2023. The Book of the Dead in the Third Intermediate Period, in: Lucarelli, R. and M.A. Stadler (eds), The Oxford Handbook of the Egyptian Book of the Dead (online edn, Oxford Academic, 20 June 2023), 82.
